name: VS Doraemon (FNF MOD)
description:
DORAEMON!! About this game:

The most famous Japanese robotic cat comes in this mod where our already protagonist bf finds a time machine and teleports to the last century where he will find 2 well-known faces from television, but it is not known if that will alter space-time.

Warning, this game contains shaking and sudden zoom! Notes:

The songs are of the Techno and Metal genre (Except Tutobita) composed by the composer and brother: Darkyapper

While the Metal songs were composed by: DISMENTOPIA, AMRPHIS and Jacob Lizotte.

Original desing and programmer: Neon Z Bird

Follow me through my Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9nAZchmVlNTojbExOS_fxA

Follow me (Darkyapper) on my social media:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Darkyapper

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG1R3VnxL3n8cSXQ11W5GQA

Hear my music: https://open.spotify.com/artist/4v9H4kVLZasvaIr7loycSl?si=VEVzVpkKSwaYaM10M4BMWA

Dorayaki!
